author: Ciaran O'Callaghan
comment: Finger print log in wont work on my Note 8. Worked on my previous samsung phone fine. Have reinstalled the app a few times but still not working. Very annoying!

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi Ciaran, can you click on and open this link to send us your details and we will investigate this matter for you; https://aib.ie/personal-forms/social-media-support-form thanks^SD

comment: Why did you change this app. Old way was fine. Can't save payees. Can't transfare money from Credit card to accounts. Once off payment so much hassle. Need to remember lots of Ibans. The only reason I kept this account open was because of the usability of this app. Time to move on.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi,
Sorry to hear that you are unhappy and we do appreciate your feedback. Once you save your Payee details via Internet Banking, you can then transfer using the Mobile app. From 13th January 2018, it is no longer possible to transfer funds from a Credit Card online, please see here for more info: https://aib.ie/notices/internet-banking
Thanks ^LM

author: Patrick Arcari
comment: Try to open the app to view my balance, and an error message comes on saying : your account is my be closed, for more information contact the customer service.   Perfect app up 2 days a go.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Patrick, 
Sorry to hear you are having issues accessing the AIB Mobile Banking App. Please contact Customer Services on 01 7712424 and select option 4, opened 24/7 and the Team will be happy to help you.
Thanks ^RF

author: A Google User
comment: This app is so slow! All I ever see is the spinning purple circle as it thinks what to do. Not very user friendly in that regard.  ****UPDATE****  I reinstalled the app as suggested, but still the same issue. Does the fact that I'm based in NZ make any difference? Shouldn't really.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi, there shouldn't be an issue where you are in the world when using the app, once you have internet service this should work for you, can we ask for your details so we can investigate into this for you https://aib.ie/personal-forms/social-media-support-form thanks ^SL

author: walter bradley
comment: App has stopped working since I updated it,  connection socket reset

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Walter, 
We were experiencing connection issues on Thursday but the Mobile Team has advised, this should now be resolved. If you are still experiencing issues, please let us know?
Thanks ^RF

author: Jeremy Kearney
comment: Unfortunately recent update hasn't solved the Finger Print Login issue (Galaxy Note 8).

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi Jeremy, we have sent this to get investigated with our Development Team, once we get a response we will reply, thank you for your patience ^SL

author: Ewen Ross
comment: Against all the Irish banking apps this is the best I've found. Every query I've needed has been sorted.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Ewen, 
Glad to hear you are enjoying the app and thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We will pass this onto our Mobile Development Team for you ^LM

comment: Never had a problem with the app since I start using it, like 5 years ago.  So easy and handy!! :)

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Constantin, 
Glad to hear you are enjoying the app, thanks for taking the time to contact us ^LM

comment: Update has stopped me from opening app torture

reply.content:

author: Ali Alazawy
comment: Finger print not working. On note 8

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Ali,
Can you please check if the Touch ID option is turned on. When you log into the App; please select Services, App Settings and Touch ID. 
Please let us know if you are still experiencing any issues.
Thanks ^LM

author: A Google User
comment: Update: finger print acting up on my OnePlus 5 (Android 8). Finger print was acting as a home key, and showing my home screen. Need to tap on AIB app screen again for it to recognise the finger. Otherwise well implemented.   Nice app, and yes some people do prefer native apps as opposed to web versions. Seems solid and secure. But it really needs functionality of moving SD

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi,
We appreciate you taking the time to send us your feedback. Could you please send us your details here (including registration number) https://aib.ie/personal-forms/social-media-support-form and we will check this out further for you.
Thanks, Anne

author: Dualta McCarron
comment: Great app, love it, use it way too much ;) I was really hoping that fingerprint login would be implemented, but I can't get it to work, I've tried eveything i could think of to fix it. Another banking app works on the same phone, I contacted support but no luck. Is there a known issue with Samsung Galaxy Note 8 by any chance?

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company

comment: This app has been acting up all day. I'm trying to send a small amount of money to another Irish account and the payment won't send. Once I confirm everything it just continuously loads!! I'm not getting anywhere and because I'm in the uk I can't get my hands on a card reader. Your support team could not do anything for me. Completely inconvenient and unreliable if you're living abroad. Sort it out and get rid of these ousted card readers.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi,
Sorry to hear you're having issues using the app. Can you please let us know if you have this problem when using 3G or WiFi?
Thanks ^AW

author: adam ahern
comment: Really nice app, very functional and works well. One problem. Since updating to android 8 on Oneplus 3t payments to other Irish accounts has stopped working.  When the continue button is pressed on the "Review Payment" screen a loading animation plays indefinitely where the continue text was before pressing. I've used both 4G and WiFi to try complete a transaction but it didn't make a difference.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Adam, 
Sorry to hear that you are expericincing issues. In order for us to try assist you on this, can you please send us your details on this link: https://aib.ie/personal-forms/social-media-support-form
Thanks ^LM

author: D F
comment: CAUTION,  AIB! The latest version of Huawei's Phone Clone app allowed me to transfer your app to a new Hiawei phone, and then use your app on the new phone without first having to verify the new device! I.e. I did not have to enter the 8-digit reg number etc yada yada. NOT good. Not good at all!  ALL other 3rd party app demand fresh login/verification upon first use on the new phone. NOT yours!

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi DF,  please contact our Customer Service Team on 0818 724 724 (or +353 1 771 24 24. Enter your 8 digit Registration number & 3 random digits from your Personal Access Code (PAC) when prompted. Press 0 to speak to a Customer Service Advisor & they will be happy to check this, available 24/7. We have passed this on to the Development Team tks ^EW

author: Conor McG
comment: Ive had many log in issues (loading... and loading.... and loading...) couldnt transfer money to another Irish account twice.... ended up logging into website and completing it there with no issues...

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi Conor,  sorry to hear you had difficulties using the service, glad it working for you now, please let us know if you have any further issues ^SL

author: Christopher Loughrey
comment: The fingerprint sign in feature is simply amazing and has really revolutionised the way we can do online banking, Making it far more convenient than getting to remember the random PAC code every time

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Glad to hear you're enjoying the new feature Christopher, thanks for posting^SD

author: George Byrne
comment: The make a once off payment doesn't work. I can fill the information field out, iban etc., but the button to make payment doesn't work. Working on WiFi, Huawei p9 and app is up to date

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi George, 
Are you making a transfer to another Irish account or to an International account? If you are making a transfer to another Irish account, please make sure the IBAN number is correct and you have entered in all the fields in order for the Continue button to be highlighted. 
Thanks ^RF

author: Keith R
comment: Perfect app. Really really handy. One thing I'd really like to see is a total amount for my pending credit card purchases so that I'd know how much I will need to pay off at a glance.

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi Keith, glad you like the App. We've passed on your feedback, please select Accounts > Statements to view your credit card statement. When printed it will advise the minimum amount and the date by which this payment is due. If you have any further queries, please come back.Thanks ^EW

author: ken noonan
comment: Great service with updates regularly. Making banking easy while on the go . Can't seem to get the finger print option on my android device - no software update available ?

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Ken, 
Thank you for your feedback, this function may not be available, you will need to check if your phone has touch capability. 
Thanks ^RF

comment: App is not working properly. Any time I move money from account to another account it doesn't change balance in any of accounts. Would have to come out of app and go back in again a few times. Using WiFi or 3g???

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content:
Hi Mark,
When you have completed a transfer, please go back to your account overview and click on this account again to view your updated balance. Thanks ^EW

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi, you can transfer up to €1000 daily via the Mobile App to other Irish accounts only without the need to use your Card Reader via the Pay & Transfer tab, thanks^SD

author: Elaine Phelan
comment: How hard should it be to transfer money to another account????!!!! Very, according to the app

reply.author: Allied Irish Banks, Public Limited Company
reply.content: Hi Elaine, sorry to hear you are unhappy with the mobile app, if you wish to transfer funds to another saved account, simply go to Pay & Transfer and select To another Irish account. To transfer to a new ROI account you will need to pair your phone to process this, if you are unable to do this pls call 0818 724 724 ^SL
